name: japan-git-ranking
description: Ranking of GitHub repositories written in Japanese

scripts.deploy: npm run zip && ibmcloud fn action update japanGithubRankingActionDev action.zip --param-file paramsDev.json --kind nodejs:16 --timeout 600000
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run zip && ibmcloud fn action update japanGithubRankingAction action.zip --param-file params.json --kind nodejs:16 --timeout 600000

author: zzzmisa
